data.name: PumPum +4 Girls Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC adds more girls to the game.
Please re-start the game after purchasing and downloading this DLC.

data.legal_notice:
Original artworks by 양만식 "Yam Spectrum".
This game is a fan-based parody. Any reference to original characters is purely coincidental.
